content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: ARMCD
      operator: non_empty
    - name: ACTARMCD
      operator: non_empty
    - name: ARMNRS
      operator: non_empty
Core:
  Id: CORE-000121
  Version: '1'
  Status: Published
Description: Verify the value for ARMNRS, when both ARMCD and ACTARMCD values are
  populated
Outcome:
  Message: Value for ARMNRS is populated, when both ARMCD and ACTARMCD values are
    populated
  Output Variables:
    - ARMCD
    - ACTARMCD
    - ARMNRS
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0520
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: "\"Specification [A coded reason that arm variables\
                  \ (ARM and ARMCD) and/or actual arm variables (ACTARM and ACTARMCD)\
                  \ are null.]\n Assumption  4[ARMNRS may not be populated if both\
                  \ ARMCD and ACTARMCD are populated]\""
                Document: IG v3.4
                Item: Specification|Assumption 4
                Section: '5.2'
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - SPECIAL-PURPOSE
  Domains:
    Include:
      - DM

json.Description: Verify the value for ARMNRS, when both ARMCD and ACTARMCD values are populated

Outcome.Message: Value for ARMNRS is populated, when both ARMCD and ACTARMCD values are populated

Citations.Cited_Guidance:
"Specification [A coded reason that arm variables (ARM and ARMCD) and/or actual arm variables (ACTARM and ACTARMCD) are null.]
 Assumption  4[ARMNRS may not be populated if both ARMCD and ACTARMCD are populated]"
